event.description: Roger Bernadina grounds out, shortstop Ruben Tejada to first baseman Ike Davis.
Steve Lombardozzi flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Mark Teahen strikes out swinging.
Chad Tracy grounds out, second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ike Davis.
Rick Ankiel homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Bryce Harper singles on a ground ball to center fielder Andres Torres.
Jesus Flores reaches on force attempt, fielding error by third baseman Justin Turner. Bryce Harper to 3rd.
Xavier Paul walks. Jesus Flores to 2nd.
Andres Blanco grounds into double play, pitcher Dillon Gee to catcher Josh Thole to first baseman Ike Davis. Bryce Harper out at home.
Pitcher Change: Matt Harvey replaces Dillon Gee.
Roger Bernadina walks.
With Steve Lombardozzi batting, Roger Bernadina caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Josh Thole to shortstop Ruben Tejada.
Steve Lombardozzi grounds out, second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ike Davis.
Mark Teahen strikes out swinging.

Chad Tracy lines out to center fielder Kirk Nieuwenhuis.
Rick Ankiel walks.
With Bryce Harper batting, Rick Ankiel steals (1) 2nd base.
Bryce Harper walks.
Jesus Flores hit by pitch. Rick Ankiel to 3rd. Bryce Harper to 2nd.

Jordany Valdespin remains in the game as the second baseman.
Ronny Cedeno remains in the game as the shortstop.

Brett Carroll reaches on fielding error by center fielder Kirk Nieuwenhuis. Brett Carroll to 2nd.
